Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Maculatin 1.3 (XXA, natural AMPs; UCLL1c; frog, amphibians, animals; ZZH)

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification:  C-terminal NH2.Activity: active against S. aureus USA300 MRSA (MIC 6.2 uM), E.coli (MIC >100 uM), B. subtilis (MIC 25 uM), and P.aeruginosa (MIC >100 uM) (Menousek et al., 2012).   inhibited Human Immunodeficiency Virus Type 1 HIV-1 (EC50 4.0 uM).Toxicity: hemolytic HC50 25 uM.  TC50 8.02 uM in CEM-SS cells (Wang G et al. 2010 Antimicrob. Agents Chemother. 54: 1343-1346). Updated 12/2023
Literature Information.Author: Apponyi MA, Pukala TL, Brinkworth CS, Maselli VM, Bowie JH, Tyler MJ, Booker GW, Wallace JC, Carver JA, Separovic F, Doyle J, Llewellyn LE.2004, Australia
Literature Information.Title: Host-defence peptides of Australian anurans: structure, mechanism of action and evolutionary significance.
